text: This is a list of leaders in the 19th century from the Holy Roman Empire. It goes to the time of German mediatisation (1801–1806) AD. ==Main== *Holy Roman Empire, Kingdom of Germany (complete list, complete list) – **Francis II, Emperor Elect, King (1792–1806) ==Austria==
